replies.body: He dunked over everyone when he secured that penta. But I think Tristana(Sneaky) should get the most credit for the penta because he solo the 3rd dragon and got the team a +5% move speed boost just before the penta.

> [{quoted}](name=mutley,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=uPvUT2M4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-05T01:45:57.834+0000)
>
> He dunked over everyone when he secured that penta. But I think Tristana(Sneaky) should get the most credit for the penta because he solo the 3rd dragon and got the team a +5% move speed boost just before the penta.

Sneaky actually didn't deal that much damage to champions and i feel that the movespeed from dragon might not have mattered that much. FNC initiated the fight and Incarnati0n's Azir have a {{item:3116}} which slows everyone he attacked and balls was standing in the front and his Q hit multiple targets in that fight and what happens after that is huni got dunked and everyone else except sivir got dunked.
I'm sorry, my intelligence level is way lower then yours.
